title: Shenandoah National Park: Self-Guided Programs
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Field Trips     Self-Guided Programs                  Self-Guided Programs         Self-guided Curriculum-based Programs In addition to the ranger-guided programs, Shenandoah National Park provides training and lesson plans for teachers to prepare for and lead curriculum-based field trips to the park. Group size limits and grade levels vary. The Come To Your Senses and Shenandoah Residents programs require reservations. Contact the Education Office: (540)999-3500 x 3489 or email. See individual program pages for more details.  Â      NPS Photo
